result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jaime H Ramirez Jr

records.addlTxt: Can post $500 in lieu of arrest and appear at next scheduled intake.

9:39 AM Defendant Jaime H Ramirez Jr not in court.  Attorney David Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Mins reflect was previously in Shawno County in custody, release 8/29.  State asking for warrant.  Court orders warrant, Statewide, can post $500 in lieu of arrest and appear at next scheduled intake date.
Email sent to Shawano Co advising def has court on Sept 12; response from Shawano Co, def release date with them is Aug 28;  ka

10:18 AM Defendant Jaime H Ramirez Jr in court, in custody from Shawno County.  Attorney Lynne Van Hollen appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Def comments release date is in 20 days, will be living in either Ashland or Milwaukee.  Still receives mail at address listed and needs to update court if address changes.  Ms. Brewer was supposed to contact, has not, Attorney Imholte says he can take case and will get in contact with def.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Email sent to Shawano County advising def has court on Aug 8 at 10:00;  ka

11:40 AM Defendant Jaime H Ramirez Jr not in court.  Attorney Lynne Van Hollen appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Jail was given notice does not appear.  Shawno county is where he was.  Arrangements to made to appear by zoom.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.
NOH

Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.
NOH
Def is set up to appear by zoom from Shawano County on June 27;  ka
Adjourned initial appearance on June 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Def has contact SPD office since his last hearing, Def thinks sometime this week he can maybe use a phone to call. Atty Brewer comments-- will call the Def at Shawano Co work release center  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Def is set up to appear by zoom from Shawano Co on June 13; ka
Adjourned initial appearance on June 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

09:00 AM Defendant Jaime H Ramirez in court, in custody in Shawano Co .  David V. Meany appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jaime H Ramirez appeared by video means. Def wants an atty, Def did not contact SPD, was waiting for them to call him. Ct advised the def to call SPD, Ct gives the def SPD phone number. Def will be in Shawano Co until 8/28  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Def is set up to appear by zoom from Shawano County on May 23;  ka
Def to have NO Contact w/ S.P.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Def to have NO Contact w/ S.P.

11:13 AM Defendant Jaime H Ramirez in court, in custody Shawano Co.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jaime H Ramirez appeared by video means.  Def has not rec'd compl, Ct gives the def his right to an atty, Def would like an atty. Def is serving a sentence and charges in another Co. State comments on bail/bond. 
Ct orders-- $5,000 sign bond, NC with SP  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Email sent to Shawano county, inmate is set up to appear by zoom on May 2, Shawano county will dial into Judge's zoom;  ka
